channel.title: RichScape PK (v3) Problems -.- [PROBLEM SOLVED, TNX TO ME]

item.title: RichScape PK (v3) Problems -.- [PROBLEM SOLVED, TNX TO ME]
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

I downloaded RichScape PK (v3) from http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,247010.0.html

I opened it, played a bit, and realised, mining, agility and farm XP are very very slow!

So, i opened client.java file, and looked for mining XP.
I found this.

[code] case 2094: // tin
case 2095:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
setAnimation(624);
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {//stuff
addSkillXP(50, 14);
addItem(438, 1);
actionTimer = 10;
sendMessage(“You Mine some Tin ore.”);
}else{
sendMessage(“You need a pickaxe to mine this.”);
}
}
break;

    case 2092:
        case 2093: // mining iron ore, second rock type [1]
	if (playerLevel[14] >= 15) {	
		if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {//stuff	
			if (actionTimer == 0) {
			setAnimation(624);		
			addSkillXP(75, 14);
        			addItem(440, 1);
			actionTimer = 10;
			sendMessage("You mine some Iron ore.");
			}
		} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1275) {//stuff		
			sendMessage("You need a pickaxe to mine this.");
		}
	} else if (playerLevel[14] <= 14) {
		sendMessage("You need 15 mining to mine this type of ore");
	}
break;[/code]

There was more of those … Coal, Mithril, Addy and Rune.

All were low xp…

So I changed to XP’s:

		addSkillXP(50, 14);

From 50 Xp to 500 XP.
I saved it, compiled it and reran the serv, but the xp was still the same…

Then i tried to add this:

		addSkillXP(50 * playerLevel[14], 14);

Still the same… Didn’t work.

Then I tried to change the Miningtimers …

		actionTimer = 10;

From 10 to 1, but still the same. Did not work, mining was still low…

What could be the problem? Did I do anything wrong??

Can anybody post the correct version of this?

[code] break;

    case 2092:
        case 2093: // mining iron ore, second rock type [1]
	if (playerLevel[14] >= 15) {	
		if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {//stuff	
			if (actionTimer == 0) {
			setAnimation(624);		
			addSkillXP((750, 14);
        			addItem(440, 1);
			actionTimer = 1;
			sendMessage("You mine some Iron ore.");
			}
		} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1275) {//stuff		
			sendMessage("You need a pickaxe to mine this.");
		}
	} else if (playerLevel[14] <= 14) {
		sendMessage("You need 15 mining to mine this type of ore");
	}
break;



	  [/code]

Read full topic
